mapper.select: select count(*) as total from images
select image_id, title, description, file_name, thumb_name, file_size, mime_type,reg_date from images where image_id between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into images (image_id, title, description, file_name, thumb_name, file_size, mime_type,reg_date) values( images_seq.nextVal, #{title}, #{description}, #{fileName}, #{thumbName}, #{fileSize}, #{mimeType}, #{regDate})
mapper.update: update images set title=#{title}, description=#{description}, file_name=#{fileName}, thumb_name=#{thumbName}, file_size=#{fileSize} where image_id=#{imageId}
